message: Let's split the money. I believe a 60/40 split is fair considering the time pressure and the fact that the money will be worth less with each round.
Your initial offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 55/45 split.
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but the value of the money decreases significantly for me with each round. Let's meet in the middle -  55/45.
